sys_script_include.description: This file simply tracks global update sets required for this application
sys_script_include.name: DeploymentNotes
sys_script_include.script:
/*
Version 1.0.3 ECM Global Update Set CTL081617 ECM_SLA_Repair_BusinessRule_v1_JWD
Version 1.0.4 Managed Documents Plug-in has been activated and is referenced on ECM Case
Version 1.0.7 ECM_DocumentValidation_ClientScript_v1_JWD ( no longer necessary past v1.0.8 ) global.US778318-History-TSF v1.0
Version 1.8.1 ** switched verison convention to major.minor.fix ECM_DocumentValidation_ClientScript_v2_JWD : This negates earlier update set ECM_DocumentValidation_ClientScript_v1_JWD. It can be ignored if that update set was not applied. ECM_DOI_SLA_Calculator_v1_JWD : Supports State-level Regulatory SLA calculations
Version 1.10.0 ECM_SLA_Repair_BusinessRule_v2_JWD : No-op update set. Fixes missing file in upstream environment. May not be necessary for future deployments.
** NOTE : Calendar spans and children for the ECM Business Schedule were missing at this point and manually imported to TEST. Make sure these migrated correctly.
Version 1.9.4 ECM_SSN-List-Mask_v1_JWD : Adds global UI Script on load of page to mask SSN fields in the ECM Case list view. ECM_SSN-List-Mask_v2_JWD : bug fix for above, clearing console error Managed_Documents-Option-Fix_JWD_v1 : Fix for ServiceNow bug in Managed Documents type setting. *** Not ECM-related *** ECM Global Update Set CTL091117-1 : Adds new role to managed documents, list modification for dms_document, Lockdown of Create NEW button on managed documents, lable override on task.due_date
Version 1.9.5 ECM_DOI_SLA_Calculator_v2_JWD : Bug fix for calendar-based DOI SLAs being a day late. ECM_DOI_SLA_Calculator_v3_JWD : Fixing North Carolina DOI SLAs being a day late.
Version 1.9.6 ECM_SLA_Repair_BusinessRule_v3_JWD : Business rules resetting ECM Quality Review SLAs on appropriate date changes. */
